b555e232-6756-4816-89fe-f6f690e8ab5b.name: Breakfast Queue
b555e232-6756-4816-89fe-f6f690e8ab5b.details: Join this queue to get bacon

messages.holding: Someone told us you want to wait for bacon. That's cool, you're a bit strange though.
messages.joined: Thanks for joining the Breakfast queue. We'll let you know when it's your turn for food.
messages.servicing: Hey it's time to go get that bacon butty or other breakfast sandwich. Go go go!
messages.serviced: We hope you enjoyed the bacon butty!

c10b59c4-f203-471d-a4b6-e3cefe3d1d2e.name: Helicopter Queue
c10b59c4-f203-471d-a4b6-e3cefe3d1d2e.details: Join this queue to fly a Helicopter

messages.holding: You're wanting to wait for the Helicopter? That's cool with us.
messages.joined: Thanks for your interest in flying our Helicopter. We'll let you know when it's free.
messages.servicing: The Helicopter is now free! Come have a play with it!
messages.serviced: Team Kill Screen would like to thank you for flying Team Kill Screen Airlines.
